name: My Talking Cat Jack (lisaweby)
description:
My Talking Cat Jack virtual pet simulator game is out. Talking Jack is a virtual pet who is eager to become your new best friend. Talking Cat Jack is a game made for everyone who loves animals and enjoys their company.

Features of My Talking Cat Jack:

-Take care of Talking Cat Jack, bathe him, feed him when he gets hungry, and when he gets tired put talking Jack to bed.

-Be creative. Design Talking Jack's house and arrange it.

-Choose the perfect outfit for your virtual pet and make him handsome.

-Play a variety of mini-games with Talking Cat Jack and win coins.

-Talk to your virtual talking pet and hear him repeat every word you say.

- Watch as your talking virtual cat's mood changes and react accordingly.

-Spin the wheel of fortune to win special prizes.

Download this great virtual pet simulator game now. My Talking Cat Jack will be your new favorite virtual pet and keep you entertained for hours.

Download link Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.jack.talking.game

Our site: https://www.gravity-code.com
